Text: Rosyth Dockyard is a large naval dockyard on the Firth of Forth at Rosyth, Fife, Scotland, owned by Babcock Marine, which formerly undertook refitting of Royal Navy surface vessels and submarines.

Text: Rosyth Dockyard:  Its primary role is now as integration site for the Royal Navy's newest aircraft carriers - the "Queen Elizabeth"-class.
